Name: Simulacrum
About the game: Soar Through The Void Grapple through abstract dreamlike environments Heal by moving as fast as possible Pick up huge amounts of speed and outrun your enemies Tear Through The Hordes Destroy waves of relentless enemies An arsenal of multipurpose weapons with strategic usage Big lasers Delve Into The Dream A fully adaptive soundtrack made by me (the guy who made everything else) Unique randomly generated levels (the cubes are in different places every time???) I hid a picture of my dog in there somewhere
